page.title: 04BUS SERVICES
page.content: Greater Manchester Transport run a {bus service}through Bowdon.The service number is 292.The terminus is Altrincham {Interchange.}The route takes it down Vicarage Lane and on to Priory Rd.The point where Bow Lane and Priory Rd meet is end of the route. The Crosville Bus Company runs routes 37,38 and 34.The 37 bus service goes down Langham Rd and Park Rd.The 37 and 34 goes down Chester Rd and Lymm Rd.Both services link up Altrincham and Warrington.The 38 also is a school bus service for Bowdon C.of E. Primary School bringing children from Dunham and Dunham Massey.
